text: Abdul Ghani bin Gilong (30 May 1932 â€“ 6 March 2021) was a Malaysian politician. From 1969 until 1978, he was a member of the Parliament of Malaysia. He was the Minister of Transport from 1970 until 1971. He also was the Minister of Works from 1972 until 1974 and again from 1976 until 1978. Ghani died at a hospital in Kota Kinabalu, Malaysia on 6 March 2021 from COVID-19, aged 88.Sabah veteran politician and former Federal Minister Ghani Gilong dies ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Malaysian politicians Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Malaysia
title: Abdul Ghani Gilong
